Astrid.content: Greetings, I am Lady Astrid Cordelia Di Costa Lune of the Noble House Lordsblade. But please, call me Astrid.
I am from the neighboring state Dhavoro. While I am a lady, I am a knight first and foremost.
I've come to the Kingdom of Anagar to help defeat the Dark Dragon and prove my status as a knight.
I have never really stayed in a village like Melostead. I've experienced all sorts of new things coming to this kingdom.
I must get back to my party. Do stay out of danger!

Zuri.content: Um, hey. My name is Zuri.
I'm a witch. I live in the woods outside of the village.
I read people's fortunes and make good luck charms. I'm great with healing magic too.
I've always enjoyed solitude. Melostead seems nice...but as a witch I prefer keeping to myself in my cottage.
Anyway, I think I'll head home now. If you have need of me, you know where I am.

Mirabelle.content: I run the Keifu inn, here in Melostead. Though it also includes a bathhouse and the local tavern.
Lately, there aren't many visitors in Melostead. I'm hoping things turn around...
I've never really left Melostead myself. I grew up here. But also, the inn keeps me very busy.
Sorry, you'll have to excuse me, I have a lot of work to do.

Lenore.content: I'm the physician here in Melostead. I run the clinic and develop my own medicine.
Melostead is a small and tightknit community. Sure, things have been a been rough lately, but we'll get through it.
...I arrived here in Melostead a few years ago. I had a bit of a rough patch, and everyone in Melostead was very kind.
Please make sure to come by if you feel ill. I'm always researching new healing methods I'd like to try.

Rosamund.content: I work at the Eagle's Rest, a hotel in the Castletown. I serve drinks, but I perform on stage a couple nights a week as a singer.
I moved out from Melostead a couple years ago. What can I say, the farm life just wasn't for me.
...I still visit Melostead every couple weeks. My ma hates that I travel so much with the monsters about, but she'd hate if I didn't visit too.
Anyway...I should get back to work. Come and visit me at the Eagle's Rest, okay?

Raleigh.content: Hey, I'm Raleigh! I run the farm with my ma and my little sister. Oh, and my herding dog Bruce.
I handle the physical farm work, tending to the animals, managing the crop fields, repairing the fences. My ma runs our shop and my little sister tends the flower garden.
Melostead is going through a rough patch. Honestly, I didn't realize, but that's what a lot of our town meetings are about lately.
I was born and raised here. I love this village, so I'm doing my part to help it grow. Some others have moved out to live in the Castletown.
I have some chores left to do today so I should get back to it. I'll see you around!

Marlon.content: I was hired to help out a knight deal with the black dragon.
We're here in Melostead for a supply run. The knight keeps wanting to help everyone here.

Gerard.content: Greetings, I am known as Gerard, High Magician of the Chalice. However, I will answer to Gerard.
As you may have assumed, I am a wizard. Though currently, I've taken a leave of absence from the Magus College of Anagar.
You see, I am doing some fieldwork for my research. I am writing a proposal that the geneology of-oh I suppose that isn't your interest. Also, I am assisting a knight in defeating a dragon.
Anyway, we've come to the quaint village of Melostead for a temporary stay. After all, we have much greater things to attend to.
Now if you'll excuse me, I'd like to do some more research before we must venture forth again.

Yasha.content: I'm a bard and I work at the Keifu Inn here in Melostead. Please, come listen to me play sometime.
There's not usually much of a crowd...Melostead doesn't draw in many travelers.
I myself only came here about a year ago. Ah, it's a bit of a long story why.
Oh, but I should go now. I need to get some practice in before tonight. Hope to see you soon.

Theo.content: I'm a traveling merchant all the way from the Dhavoro. Anything you need, you let me know.
With this dragon about, there's been plenty of opportunity for business in Anagar.
Melostead may be a small village now, but I think there's some ample opportunity for growth .
Anyway I must go now, but a pleasure to meet you. Hope to do some business with you soon.
